title: Simple sans
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/western_5314.gif)

I should probably know what this is. Heck, it may even be in our library. But this tiny poor-quality sample makes it tough.

On the off-chance it helps any, this was paired with Storm’s Baskerville in a logo.

Thanks,

T

 [‹ freehand script?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110307/http:/typophile.com/node/50236 "Go to previous forum topic") [Handwritten script type ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110307/http:/typophile.com/node/50231 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Thomas Phinney

comments.content:
Hi Thomas,

It looks like [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110307/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/avenir_std_complete_vp/) to me.

That’s it! Thanks.

I knew it was pretty familiar, and probably even one Adobe licenses... it just wasn’t coming to me.

Much appreciated,

T
